TextLibrary.Text: Emperor Selentius XVII
Your Majesty, I have a message for you from Queen Gwendholyn of Bartonia.
Your Majesty, I have a message for you from Queen Gwendholyn of Bartonia.
Your Majesty, I have a message for you from Queen Gwendholyn of Bartonia.
Your Majesty, I have a message for you from Queen Gwendholyn of Bartonia.
I see. So, do all royal messengers from Bartonia enter foreign throne rooms through trap doors rather than announcing their presence at the main gate like civilized beings?
I see. So, do all royal messengers from Bartonia enter foreign throne rooms through trap doors rather than announcing their presence at the main gate like civilized beings?
I see. So, do all royal messengers from Bartonia enter foreign throne rooms through trap doors rather than announcing their presence at the main gate like civilized beings?
I see. So, do all royal messengers from Bartonia enter foreign throne rooms through trap doors rather than announcing their presence at the main gate like civilized beings?
Um... no. My apologies, sire, but your guards refused to let me pass.
Um... no. My apologies, sire, but your guards refused to let me pass.
Um... no. My apologies, sire, but your guards refused to let me pass.
Um... no. My apologies, sire, but your guards refused to let me pass.
...and you were under orders from your Queen. Yes, yes... I know how you Agarians work.
...and you were under orders from your Queen. Yes, yes... I know how you Agarians work.
...and you were under orders from your Queen. Yes, yes... I know how you Agarians work.
...and you were under orders from your Queen. Yes, yes... I know how you Agarians work.
I apologize if I have offended you in any way.
I apologize if I have offended you in any way.
I apologize if I have offended you in any way.
I apologize if I have offended you in any way.
Offended me? Oh, no, no, no... it is the most exciting thing that has happened in this dreary place all week. Now...I think you had better deliver your message.
Offended me? Oh, no, no, no... it is the most exciting thing that has happened in this dreary place all week. Now...I think you had better deliver your message.
Offended me? Oh, no, no, no... it is the most exciting thing that has happened in this dreary place all week. Now...I think you had better deliver your message.
Offended me? Oh, no, no, no... it is the most exciting thing that has happened in this dreary place all week. Now...I think you had better deliver your message.

Bartonia is under siege by Undead creatures, sire. They are rising from their graves and attacking our villages. Queen Gwendholyn wishes to know if you have also been plagued by this problem, and she asks if you can send troops to aid her in the fight against them.

Bartonia is under siege by Undead creatures, sire. They are rising from their graves and attacking our villages. Queen Gwendholyn wishes to know if you have also been plagued by this problem, and she asks if you can send troops to aid her in the fight against them.

Bartonia is under siege by Undead creatures, sire. They are rising from their graves and attacking our villages. Queen Gwendholyn wishes to know if you have also been plagued by this problem, and she asks if you can send troops to aid her in the fight against them.
Do you have a reply that you want me to deliver to the Queen, sir?
Do you have a reply that you want me to deliver to the Queen, sir?
Do you have a reply that you want me to deliver to the Queen, sir?
Do you have a reply that you want me to deliver to the Queen, sir?
Later, perhaps. But for now...I could use the service of a strong young Agarian like yourself. Are you up for it, lad?
Later, perhaps. But for now...I could use the service of a strong young Agarian like yourself. Are you up for it, lad?
Later, perhaps. But for now...I could use the service of a charming Agarian like yourself. Are you up for it, lass?
Later, perhaps. But for now...I could use the service of a charming Agarian like yourself. Are you up for it, lass?
I am at your service, sir.
I am at your service, sir.
I am at your service, sir.
I am at your service, sir.
Good, good, good. Come back and see me later. I believe I have just the task for you. Oh, and if you don't mind, could you use the front door this time? I'll see to it that the guards let you pass.
